description:
Jim is a surfer who works part time as a waiter. A girlfriend of mine was at the beach and ran into him. He was hanging out by himself (probably girl watching), so she approached him and struck up a conversation.
After talking for a few minutes, she broached the subject of nude modeling. Jim wasn't shy at all and thought showing off his body for some extra money was a great idea.
On the day of the shoot, Jim was really nervous. I had him pump some iron to work off the extra energy and get him relaxed a little. In the beginning he kept cracking up, but soon enough his pants were off and he was working his way to a big, powerful load...
title: Jim
